name: BParameterComponent
sample: <BParameterComponent paramType='YOURPARAMTYPE' hintText='Your hint text' labelText='Your label text' />

infoArray.name: paramType
infoArray.desc: The paramType of your component.

infoArray.name: paramColumns
infoArray.desc: Determines the columns of the parameter component. Columns can define an array with => name: string.isRequired, header:string, width:number, visible:bool.  Default columns are paramType, paramCode, paramDescription, paramValue.

infoArray.name: sortOption
infoArray.desc: Sort the parameters. Available options is BParameterComponent.SortOption.Code, BParameterComponent.SortOption.Description, BParameterComponent.SortOption.Value

infoArray.name: paramTypeList
infoArray.desc: The collection of paramType.

infoArray.name: paramCode
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param code

infoArray.name: paramDate
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param date

infoArray.name: paramValues
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param value

infoArray.name: selectedParamCode
infoArray.desc: Determines the parameter that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: paramValue2Filter
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param value 2

infoArray.name: paramValue3Filter
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param value 3

infoArray.name: paramValue4Filter
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param value 4

infoArray.name: paramValue5Filter
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param value 5

infoArray.name: paramValue6Filter
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param value 6

infoArray.name: paramValue7Filter
infoArray.desc: Filter the parameters by param value 7

infoArray.name: isAllOptionIncluded
infoArray.desc: If true an item will push to the first row of the parameter list. Default is value is false.

infoArray.name: allOptionDescription
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true.. Default value is 'Hepsi'

infoArray.name: allOptionValue
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true.. Default value is '-1'

infoArray.name: hintText
infoArray.desc: The hint content to display.

infoArray.name: labelText
infoArray.desc: The content of the floating label.

infoArray.name: displayMemberPath
infoArray.desc: Display your chosen column on parameter component. Default column is 'paramDescription'

infoArray.name: disableSearch
infoArray.desc: Display the search input field top of the fec component.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the parameter component will be disabled.

infoArray.name: getValue()
infoArray.desc: Get the parameter that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: getValues()
infoArray.desc: Returns the list of parameters

infoArray.name: setValues(parameterList)
infoArray.desc: Set the Parameters by parameterList

infoArray.name: setValuesByCodes(paramCodeList)
infoArray.desc: Set the Parameters by paramCodes. paramCodeList is a string array

infoArray.name: sortValues(sortOption)
infoArray.desc: Sort the parameters. Available options is BParameterComponent.SortOption.Code, BParameterComponent.SortOption.Description, BParameterComponent.SortOption.Value

infoArray.name: onParameterSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the parameter has been selected.
